name: Jumpah (itch)
description:
Rewind time at your leisure, or mental demise. Can you get to the top before you drown? Of course, you can always rewind time. So will you EVER get to the top? Or will you stay at the bottom? 

Every rewind of time you make adds a second of time that you have to go through. Be careful, else you'll end up in square one. 

Controls are:
A and D move left and right

Space to jump

E to rewind time
